trans-unit.source: Provides access to the application domain and process of an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 提供外接程序的应用程序域和进程的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to load add-ins into a desired environment, which can be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 此类用于将外接程序加载到所需的环境，可以是以下项之一：

trans-unit.source: An existing application domain for which you have the <xref:System.AppDomain> object.
trans-unit.target: 现有应用程序域必须为其<xref:System.AppDomain>对象。

trans-unit.source: An application domain that was automatically generated to activate an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 若要激活外接程序已自动生成应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: An existing external process.
trans-unit.target: 现有的外部进程。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object for an add-in, pass the add-in's application domain to the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>对象外接程序，请将传递外接程序的应用程序域到<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>类构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A> property of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController> class to obtain the add-in's <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>属性<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController>类来获取外接程序的<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>对象。

trans-unit.source: After you obtain the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object, you can do the following:
trans-unit.target: 获取之后<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>对象，你可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Pass that <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object to the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 传递<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>到相应的对象<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The add-in will be activated in the application domain and process that is represented by the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序将在中激活的应用程序域和进程，由表示<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A> property to obtain an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment.Process%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>对象。

trans-unit.source: Then pass that object to the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 然后将该对象传递给相应<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The add-in will be activated in the process that is represented by the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object but in a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序将激活在由进程中<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>对象但新的应用程序域中。

trans-unit.source: The application domain that contains the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 包含外接程序的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you have access to the application domain that contains the add-in you need, you can use this constructor to obtain the add-in's <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以访问包含你需要的外接程序的应用程序域，你可以使用此构造函数获取外接程序的<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>对象。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you can use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A> property of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController> class to obtain the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object.
trans-unit.target: 否则，你可以使用<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>属性<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController>类来获取<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="appDomain" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="appDomain" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Full-trust permission is demanded.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任权限。

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call chain does not have sufficient permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用链中的调用方没有足够权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess" /> object that represents the process in which the add-in is running.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess" /> 对象，该对象表示在其中运行外接程序的进程。

trans-unit.source: The process in which the add-in is running.
trans-unit.target: 在其中运行外接程序的进程。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to activate multiple add-ins in the same process but in different domains.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于激活多个外接程序在同一进程中但在不同的域。

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess> object obtained with this property to the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 传递<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInProcess>获取与此属性设置为相应的对象<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If you want to activate them in the same domain in an external process you should pass the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object directly to the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要激活它们在相同域中外部进程应传递<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>对象直接<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载。
